alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 08 at 2:51AM PST until January 11 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...From Monday morning through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains
